ygData.subject: Interesting bug
ygData.msgSnippet: Earlier tongiht I was hunting with a druid friend in Permafrost.  We got in to a bit of trouble so we took off to the zone.  When I hit the zone, I went
ygData.messageBody:
Earlier tongiht I was hunting with a druid friend in Permafrost. We got in
to a bit of trouble so we took off to the zone. When I hit the zone, I went
through the whole
LOADING
process, but wound up BACK in Permafrost (at the first corner where the 3
gobbies spawn) and at almost full health (I went in with less than a bubble,
and came back with only 1 bubble gone). I'm not complaining or anything,
but has anyone else noticed this or is it just on The Rathe?

-=B=-
